item.title: My Slate Setup
item.description: About a year and a half I go, I took the leap from running Microsoft Windows as my main operating system and switched into full «hipster mode», i.e. switched to a Macbook Air and OS X. Simply put, «the change» was not that hard and most everything has worked without problems, and for those things that still require Microsoft Windows, well, there is VMware Fusion for that. While I´m admittedly still a novice OS X user, and not even close to mastering OS X, I´d like to share my current Slate setup.
